ECSchema.description: This schema contains classes used for Substation Design.

ECEntityClass.description: Represents the Functional, 2D Graphical, 3D Physical and Connection data associated with an Electrical Equipment or Device.

ECProperty.description: Fully Qualified Class-Name of the Equipment's Physical Class.
Fully Qualified Class-Name of the Equipment's Functional Class.

ECNavigationProperty.description: Reference to the Equipment's Physical Type Class.

ECEntityClass.description: Represents the Physical Type that stores the name of the physical class to be instanced when an electrical equipment is placed. Further the physical type has a reference to the recipe of the graphical elements that need to instanced. These graphical elements represent the physical geometry of the equipment. Can also a shared set of properties whose values vary per-type of an ElectricalPhysicalType.

Can also a shared set of properties whose values vary per-type of an ElectricalPhysicalType.

ECProperty.description: The Drawing affinity of the Equipment Definition's Symbol reference
